          <title>
            <string language="nl">Artie Ounces Soda Jerk</string>
          </title>
          <language>nl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Make as much money as possible in five minutes by using metric conversions to fulfill customer orders. You need to have JavaScript enabled in your browser.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">metric conversions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">cup</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <structure>

            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <aggregationLevel>
            <source>aggregationLevelValues</source>
            <value>4</value>
          </aggregationLevel>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verdienen Sie so viel Geld, wie möglich in fünf Minuten, 
indem Sie metrische Konvertierungen verwenden, um Kunde Ordnungen zu 
erfüllen. Sie müssen das Javascript haben, das in Ihrer 
Datenbanksuchroutine aktiviert wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Faites autant argent comme possible en cinq minutes en 
employant des conversions métriques pour accomplir des commandes de 
client. Vous devez avoir le Javascript permis dans votre 
navigateur.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Faça tanto dinheiro como possível em cinco minutos 
usando conversões métricas cumprir ordens do cliente. Você 
necessita ter o Javascript permitido em seu browser.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Faccia tanti soldi come possibile in cinque minuti 
usando le conversioni metriche per soddisfare le richieste del 
cliente. Dovete avere Javascript permesso in vostro browser.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κάνετε όσο το δυνατόν περισσότερα χρήματα σε πέντε λεπτά 
με τη χρησιμοποίηση των μετρικών μετατροπών για να εκπληρώσει τις 
κατατάξεις πελατών. Πρέπει να επιτρέψετε JavaScript στον 
ξεφυλλιστή σας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Haga tanto dinero como sea posible en cinco minutos 
usando conversiones métricas para satisfacer pedidos del cliente. 
Usted necesita tener Javascript permitido en su browser.</string>
          </description>
